Text: I've been having problems with the last few torrents, they refuse to open in uTorrent regardless of whether I open them directly within the browser or save them first, then open them. has anything changed recently?

to pdizzubble,

Well, if you don't know, TPB has been sold and you need to reregister, although that shouldn't affect downloads.


to s7nt4x,

Welcome back.  I'm tired of these uploaders who think MQ is good enough when HQ is available.
